alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Cross; St. Francis (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 11:51AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern St. Francis, west central Crittenden and southeastern Cross Counties through 1215 PM CDT... At 1151 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jennette, or 8 miles south of Parkin, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... West Memphis, Marion, Edmondson, Jennette, Simsboro, Crittenden, Chatfield, Proctor, Kate, Browns, Jonquil, Tarsus, Cicalla, Heth, Clarks Corner, Democrat, Shearerville and Lehi. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
